dinu me bima yalith le wilak wannata ida nodiya yuthuyi aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha "thrasthawadaya parada wijayagrahanayen dinu deshaya yalith dekada karannata ho me rata yalith le wilak karannata wijathika balawegawalata ida nothabima me rate kruthaguna danna podu mahath janathawage yuthukama bawa" aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.

dashaka thunak thisse pawathi thrasthawadaya nisa apa rate sama sewawakma durwala wana wita pahatha nowatunu ekama sewawa heda sewawa bawa aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.ada lokaye oonama rataka heda sewawa samanga sama mattame thabiya haki apa rate heda sewawa thawaduratath ihala damiya yuthu bawath ee sandaha upadhiya pirinamimata hondama yugaya me yugaya bawath amathiwaraya kiweya.amathiwaraya mese prakasha kale jathyanthara heda dina samarum ulelata araliyagaha mandiraye di eeye (17) ekwemini.rajya sewa eksath heda sangamaya sanwidhana kala mema uthsawaya amathu amathiwaraya wadiduratath meseda kiweya.aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha:-rajya sewa eksath heda sangamaye meheyawimen ada heda dinaya me aakarayata samarenawa.

mahawali sanwardhana wyaparaya adin dashaka hatharakata pera aarambha wuwa da eya thawath wasara siya dahas gananak janathawage keth wathu saru karamin idiriyata ma gaman karanu athi athara mahawaliyata nawa jawayak labademin suwisheshi wadakotasak wathman janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha wisin itukarana ladi. 1995 wasare sita gatha wu wasara 15ka kalaya thula kadinam mahawali salasmata obben kriyathmaka wu wyapruthi saha wadasatahanwala kriyakarithwaya pilibanda likhitha prakashanayaka aduwa sapuralamin mahawali adhikariye mulikathwayen “95n pasu mahawali” granthaya sampadanaya kara atha.
